feed.subtitle: {"cn"=>"镁合金微弧氧化; 铝合金快速阳极氧化; 局部氧化及涂层修复技术; 等离子体增强化学气相沉积 (PECVD); 物理气相沉积 (PVD) 气致变色薄膜; 表面改性; 电化学; 腐蚀与防护", "en"=>"Magnesium Anodizing & PEO; Aluminium Fast Anodizing; Material Chemistry; PECVD; PVD; Photosensitive Resin; Gas-induced Color Film; Surface Modification; Electrochemistry Corrosion and Protection"}
